entry.tran: (以全谷物和有机蔬菜为主的食物)健康的，可延年益寿的
entry.def: Macrobiotic food consists of whole grains and vegetables that are grown without chemicals.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the theory or practice of macrobiotics;
